Class TabFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • it.polimi.deib.p2pchat.discovery.TabFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class TabFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
    Class that represents a Fragment with other Fragments as Tabs.

    Created by Stefano Cappa on 05/02/15.

      • isValidTabNum

        public boolean isValidTabNum(int tabNum)
        Method to check if tabNum is valid.

        tabNum is valid if tabNum >= 1 && tabNum <= this.getWiFiChatFragmentList().size().

        ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

        Example:

        getWiFiChatFragmentList 0 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 : Index of the list. Size is equals to 9

        tabNum 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 : number of tabs

        Condition for tabNum:

        1] 0 is reserved to servicelist i.e. tabNum>=1

        2] 9 <= size()=9 i.e. tabNum <= tabFragment.getWiFiChatFragmentList().size()

        Finally 1 AND 2!!!

        ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

        Parameters:
        tabNum - int that represents the tab number to check
        Returns:
        true of false, if the condition is valid or not.
